mapper.update:
UPDATE so_return_item
return_id = #{returnId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
mp_id = #{mpId},
product_price_final = #{productPriceFinal},
product_item_num = #{productItemNum},
piecework_unit = #{pieceworkUnit},
product_total_amount = #{productTotalAmount},
return_product_item_num = #{returnProductItemNum},
discount_amount = #{discountAmount},
coupon_amount = #{couponAmount},
purchase_amount = #{purchaseAmount},
product_cname = #{productCname},
product_pic_path = #{productPicPath},
so_item_id = #{soItemId},
product_price_sale = #{productPriceSale},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
WHERE id = #{id}
